full_text: Screened by NARA, 8/11/2023 CONVERSION PRIVILEGE You may obtain individual coverage for your spouse after your group coverage ends by applying directly to The Trav- rlers Insurance Company. If you apply for individual coverage for your spouse within 31 days of your last day of active work, his or her coverage will be continued without interruption. No medical examination will be required. You may choose individual coverage for your spouse in any form offered by the insurance company, except term insurance. You will be charged the regular rates for a person of your spouse's age and occupation. This policy cannot be converted to an individual policy for any of your dependents except your spouse. ADMINISTRATION OF THE PLAN Your Dependent Life Insurance Plan is provided through an insurance contract with The Travelers Insurance Company held by the Honeywell Employee Benefits Association (HEBA). All contributions are paid as premiums to the insurance company, which in turn pays out plan benefits according to the contract. Your Dependent Life Insurance Plan is registered with the United States Department of Labor under Employer Identi- fication Number 41-1440155. The Plan Number is 501. Your Dependent Life Insurance Plan records are kept accord- ing to a Plan Year beginning on January 1 and ending on December 31. The Plan Administrator is: Honeywell Employee Benefits Association Honeywell Plaza Minneapolis, Minnesota 55408 Attention: Corporate Insurance and Risk Management Department Telephone: (612) 870-5200 PUBLICATION NUMBER 59-7130, AUGUST, 1983 5
